languages.text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} has not attacked this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{uip|BonusArmour|8f5993cab35844cd8e0efbadc1c5dcbe}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Charge and Slash do not affect this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the Fighter has not attacked this turn, they gain +10+2×(TOU Bonus)% to Armour. Charge and Slice do not affect this bonus.
If the Fighter has not attacked this turn, they gain +10+2×(TGH Bonus)% to Armor. Charge and Slice do not affect this bonus.

traits.locale_text: Если в этом ходу воин не атаковал, он получает +10+2×(бонус ВЫН)% к броне. Применение Рывка или Рассечения не влияет на получение бонуса.

languages.text: 如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内没有进行过攻击，则{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高{uip|BonusArmour|8f5993cab35844cd8e0efbadc1c5dcbe}%。 英勇冲锋与快刀一闪不会影响此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果。

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nicht angegriffen hat, erhält er +{uip|BonusArmour|8f5993cab35844cd8e0efbadc1c5dcbe} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.
